Terminion stops. This time the other 4 stop behind him. Terminion draws a r=
ifle. Monster does so as well. The other 3 draw pistols.

Terminion: Do you=
 really believe we'd follow you after a comment like that?...

  ----- Orig=
inal Message -----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent:=
 Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:56 AM
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

=

        Skulletron stopped angrily, and turned around to face them.

     =
   Skulletron:  Look, if it weren't for this damned organic side of me, I w=
ouldn't have to eat you guys to stay in perfect condition, but I do.  So sh=
ut up or go to the pit!

        He points his gun at Terminion.

        S=
kulletron:  I'm having second thoughts on who I will eat first.

        He=
 turned around, and continued his long walk...

        -------Original Mes=
sage-------

        From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Date: August 04, =
2002 03:23:59 AM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Subject: Re: Ch=
aracter Debut/Return...

        Terminion stopped and the other 4 start pu=
shing him forward.

        Terminion: Hold the internet connection, here, =
what's this about eating people? It sounds kind of like you're crazy.

    =
    Junk Man: There is nothing wrong with being crazy! Don't listen to him,=
 he's so rude.

        Terminion: I'M rude? You wrecked my ship!

        =
Junk Man: Shut up...

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          Fro=
m: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunda=
y, August 04, 2002 2:45 AM
          Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...=



                Skulletron:  Shut up.  Or else I'll eat you first!

    =
            Skulletron sneared and kept on walking...

                ----=
---Original Message-------

                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  =
              Date: August 04, 2002 02:57:02 AM
                To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

   =
             Mincer: Will this lead us out of the desert?...

             =
     ----- Original Message -----
                  From: LurkerAbyss
     =
             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                  Sent: Sunday, Aug=
ust 04, 2002 1:59 AM
                  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return.=
..


                        Skulletron glared at Terminion sinisterly, and=
  then looked forward and continued walking...

                        ---=
----Original Message-------

                        From: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com
                        Date: August 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
          =
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                        Subject: R=
e: Character Debut/Return...

                        Terminion stares.

  =
                      Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

            =
            He looked at the other 4.

                        Monster: Grr=
.

                        Terminion: Okay. Let's go.

                    =
    They follow Skulletron. Who knows why? They just do...

               =
           ----- Original Message -----
                          From: Lur=
kerAbyss
                          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
             =
             Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:32 AM
                        =
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                                =
Skulletron looked at the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at =
their feet.

                                Skulletron:  I've seen too muc=
h.  You follow me.  Or else, I will devour you.  And I'm not kidding.  Don'=
t speak until spoken to.  Don't try anything funny, unless you feel like di=
eing.

                                The Slaughter(organic) half of him h=
issed, as slime dripped from his mouth  and body.  Skulletron then began wa=
lking forward.  He slipped a gun out from a special compartment, and aimed =
it at Terminion's head, and then dropped his arm and gun back down to his s=
ide, and continued walking...

                                -------Origi=
nal Message-------

                                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com
                                Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
   =
                             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                   =
             Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

                      =
          The Five Felons were just strolling up when this incredible act h=
appened!

                                Terminion: Hello.

              =
                  He got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need to=
.

                                Terminion: Hello friend.

              =
                  Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 charac=
ter limit started, it was tough to survive as a serious character, you just=
 got ignored.

                                Junk Man: Ask him what side =
he's on.

                                Danny: No, stupid, what side are =
WE on?

                                Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of=
 Cardhead getting decapitated and disemboweled...

                        =
        ----- Original Message -----
                                From: =
LurkerAbyss
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
    =
                            Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
       =
                         Subject: Character Debut/Return...


             =
                   OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my first character in this "rest=
art".  God, I hate this damn restart.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

   =
                             BIC: 

                                A deser=
ted stretch of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now being rep=
laced by a quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to fall and s=
howered the ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky.  As time =
flew by, the storm raged on, getting more violent each minute.  The sky sud=
denly bloomed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck the ear=
th below.  The wet mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, as a fist=
 plunged up from the ground!  Another streak of lightning met with the fist=
.  There was an explosion of sparks, and then the ground started to shake v=
igorously.  The fist started rising out of the ground, and revealed an arm.=
  The arm kept rising, and then another fist and arm popped out of the grou=
nd.  Soon, a head was revealed.  The figure started forcing its way out of =
the ground.  The storm had reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground=
 and raging on madly.  Within a matter of long, never-ending minutes, the f=
igure stood on two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, so suddenly.  Ev=
erything seemed to stop at that moment.  The rain, everything, just disappe=
ared.  The sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up there. =
 Calm as a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on the land was hideous.  =
It was almost two things merged into one.  One half was metallic, almost ro=
botic.  The other half, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a hand...=
....

                                ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...
